body_html: Using the timeline module I see that I have very slow batch normalization. One example of "moments/sufficient_statistics/mean_ss" took 413.262ms and "gradients/batchnorm/add_1_grad/Sum_1" took 413.357ms. I feel like this is a lot slower than I've seen before. As a sanity check, are these along the same order of magnitude you all are seeing in your benchmarks? This is with a Titan X.
